data.system_settings: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, Asus Netbook F551C, Intel Core i3 64bits
data.actual_result: The cursor appears to be a highlighter but you can't select the server name
data.expected_result: Either you should be able to select the text, or the cursor should be normal
data.short_description: In the Server Notifications modal, hovering over the server name will change the cursor into an highlighter, even though you cannot select the text [Desktop app only, doesn't happen on browser]
data.steps_to_repro: - Right click on any server in your server list - Click on Notifications in the context menu - Hover your mouse over the server name in small characters just below the main modal title
